dict.acceptation: 惭愧的，羞耻的，害臊的；难为情；

sent.orig: He who is ashamed of asking ashamed of learning.
We are ashamed of sin and yet not ashamed to sin.
sent.trans: 我们耻于罪而不耻于犯罪。

sent.orig: He who is ashamed of asking is ashamed of learning.
Let all mine enemies be ashamed and sore vexed: let them return and be ashamed suddenly.
sent.trans: 我所有的仇敌都必蒙羞，大大惊惶；眨眼之间，他们必蒙羞后退。

sent.orig: It is no use being ashamed of this.
sent.trans: 在这里怕羞是没有用的。
